title: Second SAR satellite advances Space42’s hybrid connectivity and imagery vision
key_assets: LEO mission operations center in Abu Dhabi
SAR satellite manufacturing capabilities in UAE
summary: Space42, a UAE-based satellite operator formed by the merger of Yahsat and Bayanat, has established communications with its second SAR satellite, Foresight-2, provided by Finnish operator ICEYE. The companies have an existing agreement for at least five LEO SAR satellites and a joint venture to build SAR satellites within the UAE. The partnership aims to enhance Space42’s AI-driven geospatial capabilities and advance the UAE’s SAR technology sector.
why_it_matters: This partnership strengthens ICEYE’s market position by expanding its customer base and manufacturing footprint in the Middle East. For Space42, it accelerates the UAE’s ambitions in SAR technology and AI-driven satellite data analysis, supporting broader goals in space technology and emerging markets like autonomous vehicles.

entities.name: ICEYE
entities.role: SAR satellite provider and technology partner
